content: OK, there seems to be growing confusion about the song title "solid resolution theory" in LTE3. Can someone retweet the Nature article, tag #lte3 and ask whether #solidresolutiontheory is pure coincidence? :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
Ooh, and please post a link to the tweet here (-;

https://twitter.com/XenaProject/status/1407317203461062657?s=20

#solidresolutiontheory could be used to describe some of the work going on here https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-01627-2), a maths project named in homage to the band Liquid Tension Experiment. But it's also a track on their album #LTE3 ! Coincidence @MikePortnoy @Jcrudess @JPetrucci @tonylevin ?

- The Xena Project (@XenaProject)
This is certainly the most important open question remaining in this project!
What's the emoji for crazy seemingly asynchronous time signatures? :wink:
